abstract: University of California, Berkeley, announces resignation of Claude Steele, executive vice chancellor and provost, for personal reasons; resignation occurs even as he and other administrators have faced criticism for handling of expanding sexual harassment scandal at school.

headline.print_headline: Berkeley’s Provost Resigns Amid University’s Turmoil
headline.main: Provost Resigns Amid Sexual Harassment Case at Berkeley

snippet: Claude Steele and other top administrators have been criticized for their handling of a sexual harassment scandal. Mr. Steele will join Berkeley’s faculty.
lead_paragraph: Claude Steele and other top administrators have been criticized for their handling of a sexual harassment scandal. Mr. Steele will join Berkeley’s faculty.
